title: How to Get Super Mario Brothers and Pac Man for Nintendo Wii

steps.headline: Press get Wii points if you don't already have 1,000
Get the pack for 10 dollars for 1,000 points
steps.description: once you have filled out all the info go to the home of the Wii shop

steps.headline: Then when you're there you have to go to the virtual console.
Type in Super Mario.
steps.description: It will be the one that says Super Mario Bros.

steps.headline: Do the same for Pac-Man.
steps.description: You have the games now to play them:.

steps.headline: Go to the Wii home they should be a channel.
steps.description: If not you saved it on the SD CARD.

steps.headline: Go to the Wii menu and then you click SD card down by the Wii options.

text: Go to the Wii shop  Press get Wii points if you don't already have 1,000  Get the pack for 10 dollars for 1,000 points once you have filled out all the info go to the home of the Wii shop Then when you're there you have to go to the virtual console.  Search by category.  Type in Super Mario. It will be the one that says Super Mario Bros. Do the same for Pac-Man. You have the games now to play them:. Go to the Wii home they should be a channel. If not you saved it on the SD CARD. Go to the Wii menu and then you click SD card down by the Wii options.  it will be there.  try again if it happens.
